reviews.review_text: Saying it s good is an understatement. I tried the classic vegan chickun burger and it was hands down one of the BEST I ve ever had! Fair pricing, plenty of street parking, so many options to come back to. My friend tried the burger and said it tasted exactly like the real thing
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words! Were thrilled to hear you enjoyed your experience at our restaurant. We appreciate your support and look forward to welcoming you back soon! For being a loyal customer, we will offer you a 10% off coupon for your next visit to our restaurant. Please provide your email. Thanks Vegan Fried Chickun

reviews.review_text: Great vegan spot! Tried the sweet chilli wrap which was great, but had too much sauce in it. I would recommend it but ask for less sauce than usual. They have 3 tables inside for seating.

Best vegan food in Vancouver for vegetarians. Its burgers, fries and desserts are just amazing. The eggless waffles were really yummy. The vegan crepes and waffles are very hard to find anywhere in town but I am glad they have it here! Dietary restrictions: Lots of gluten-free, vegan and vegetarian options

Last night I have been to this underdog restaurant in the main streets of Vancouver. When I tried the food, I was like speechless. Lovely quality, fabulous presentation, excellent behaviour of the owner named - Granth. Must recommended. Don t forget to follow on instagram as well as they offer new schemes on food on festival season.

Hidden gem in the neighborhood! Fresh fish and meat with tasty sauce/dressing inside the sushi burritos. Fair price and portion. Will definitely go back to try the rest of the menu. The Hojicha frappe looks good as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: Great Vegan Spot! Everything we tried was delicious. We had chocolate cake, tiramisu, and double chocolate brownies a la mode. So nice to have so many vegan options!

This place was a great find! :) I love the array of desserts offered and the location is perfect. Limited seating but theres a park 1 block away which makes for a nice view. Definitely coming back for seconds

Such a treat to find this vegan fast food spot in south Vancouver! Came here for a late lunch and ordered a house salad, chick un tenders, and desserts. They make the BEST vegan tenders I ve ever had! The crunchy exterior has popped quinoa (yum!) and the chick un interior is semi-moist.  All their dipping sauces are vegan too! I had the flaming mayo and chipotle sauces which were both heavenly with the tenders. The salad was fresh to order and tasted so refreshing On top of their savoury dishes, they offer vegan desserts like vegan cookies from Bonus bakery, vegan cakes, crepes, smoothies, ice coffees, and more! Looking forward to coming back soon

I havent had much experience vegan chicken patties (outside of nuggets) and thoroughly enjoyed my Coleslaw Crispy ChickUN Burger. I appreciated it having both lettuce and coleslaw I couldnt go without adding pickles either (a personal preference). The combination of the soft, toasted bun, fresh, crunchy toppings and firm patty were great. The skinny lemon pepper (at no extra cost) fries were cooked to my preference, not dry or overcooked, still soft in the middle. The server and chef was very nice to tell me about their menu and business. They packaged the food with care. This is their second location and theyve been open for about a year. I cant believe theyre open until 5am most days.

I have ordered a couple of times now and the food is delicious! Ive tried the flaming wrap, samosa burger, hasbrowns and paratha roll. The price is very low for the food quality.  Savory amazing vegan food with an Indian twist. Food is fresh and very tasty. Vegetarian options: It is all vegan Dietary restrictions: All vegan
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words! Were thrilled to hear you enjoyed your experience at our restaurant. We appreciate your support and look forward to welcoming you back soon! For being our loyal customer we are offering you a 10% off coupon for your next visit, please provide your email. Thanks Vegan Fried Chickun

reviews.review_text: Love their butter chickun and chutney wraps. Theyre burgers are pretty delish too! Their samosas are new to the menu and honestly are one of the crispiest Ive tried. They are not all junk food as they also offer healthy smooth bowls and bagels all day long.
We came here with the vegan coupon book and it s been the best brunch in a long time. The chicken tenders and burger are out of this world!! Lovely staff too. Definitely recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words! Were thrilled to hear you enjoyed your experience at our restaurant. We appreciate your support and look forward to welcoming you back soon! For being our loyal customer we are offering you a 10% off coupon for your next visit, please provide your email. Thanks Vegan Fried Chickun

reviews.review_text: ***This was for Simple Bites which seems to be out of business now*** Great neighborhood restaurant operated by some of the nicest people around. The food is a blend of Japanese and western favourites that is sure to please a wide range of people. Regardless of what you order you can guarantee that it is going to be delicious and the prices wont break the bank! You can order at the restaurant or order online through their sleek website for pickup or delivery. The staff are always so polite and you can tell theyre always happy to see you
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: Great little hidden gem This was my first time and staff member V recommended to try the chick un nuggets (original flavour) or the chick un tenders (more flavour) and was blown away at how it looked and tasted super close to the real thing - they even got the texture down I also tried their classic poutine with real cheese (they also have a vegan cheese option), ALSO quite yummy.  The chick un tenders really stole the show though! I had it with chipotle sauce (recommended by V) and spicy mayo sauce. Don t let the simple decor and warm interior fool you, the food is worth checking out Will be back to try the burgers & sandwiches!!!

Loved everything about vegan fried chicken! The service was friendly and informative. The inside was comfortable to sit in for a casual spot. A nicer fast food vibe. The nuggets I ordered were amazing with good texture. the honey mustard, sweet Thai sauce and all sauces you can choose are cruelty free. My partner had the sweet Thai chicken wrap and it was good. We were impressed with the vegan crepe options as well. The oat smoothie I ordered, banana was delicious. Sadly they were out of the phish filet, already was planning to come back but excited to try that! Truly so nice going to a dessert and comfort food joint that s all cruelty free I wish I got pictures of the food and the main menu. always forget cause everything looked so delicious.

Patient and helpful staff and amazing food. Ate a sweet chilli vegan chicken burger and poutine and it was 5/5. Their chocolate almond smoothie was really good as well. Definitely coming back and recommending it to my vegetarian friends!

SimpleBites is truly a hole-in-the-wall! In an unassuming spot along Fraser Street lives this local gem with an extensive menu that offers poke bowls, Japanese tapas, and most importantly - sushi burritos. It was my first time finding out about this place and I cant get over their sushi burritos... which costs only around $10. So reasonably priced with incredibly fresh ingredients. The perfect spot to go to for a quick, hearty lunch/dinner without breaking the bank. The portions are so generous. I couldnt even finish half my burrito in one sitting. Im stoked to come back to try the rest of their menu! Everything sounds so delicious and honestly, I had the hardest time trying to take my pick!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: Really great vegan nuggets! Thats all I got on this occasion but I definitely need to go back and try more of the menu! Vegetarian options: Fully vegetarian cafe

This place is such a hidden gem! The food is beyond delicious, the nuggets will literally blow you away, they are the best we ve tried anywhere, so worth the journey from wherever you are coming from!! Also the burgers are divine and they have really tasty kombuchas there as well. For all the non vegan folk they even have Cheesecake Factory desserts!! But seriously, everything we try is so good, 12/10! The owners are really delightful, super friendly on the phone and in person and answering all your questions, and that was what made my friend recommend them to me in the first place! Amazing local shop to support!

I wish I would have tried the sweet & sour chicken grilled cheese that just sounds amazing. This was my first time I kept it  simple  with the simple burger   and added   fries. Amazing little place. And I m very happy to support local. Oh and it tastes amazing. I ll be back soon.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: Affordable and super sweet owners. They use quality protein in their food. Amazing service, it feels like they care about their customers. A lot of new food introduced on the menu seasonally. Amazing matcha latte! Super worth it for $4! Everything was extremely clean. The Ordering kiosk makes it super easy to view the menu.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: SO incredibly glad we gave this place a try today. The name perfectly describes the place. Everything is SIMPLE and surprisingly tasty! Some portions are snack sized which is awesome because it allowed us to try multiple items. We ordered: - Egg Chashu Rice - It looked simple but was really delicious. The Chashu was melt in your mouth soft and full of flavour. The ramen egg was done to perfection and the sweet soy sauce tied it all together.  *Tip: Ask for extra sauce* - Simple Grilled Cheese - A rather simple grilled cheese, kind of like something I would make at home. Toast, butter, cheese, toasted. - Mini Poke Bowl - This was an interesting version of a poke bowl but came with only 1 pc of tuna and 1 pc of salmon. Maybe try the full size version? -Churro Donut - Looked unpromising but gosh it was like AH- MAZING!!! Like, knock my socks off amazing! You HAVE TO order this if youre a churro fan like me! - Iced Creamy Vanilla Coffee - Went nicely with the donut (: We ordered on their website and ate it at the beautiful Memorial Park- about a block away. Obviously, I am in love with this place and will definitely be returning real soon (like.. tomorrow? lol) to try out the other items all that the other 5 star ratings have been raving about! Please come support this local small business so we can always have this gem around!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: Vegan Fried Chick UN is Me and my boyfriend s one of the favourite vegan places we lately found! Their plant-based chicken nugget and the burgers, and the desserts are all so great!!! Especially the nugget is crunched outside and tender inside, It just so goood, I even like it more than a real chicken nugget. And the lady who works there is nice and friendly!! I highly recommend this place, You should try it!

We ordered - Cauliflower Tempura, vegan Filipino pols chicken sandwich, nuggets & Strawberry Cheesecake. Everything vegan. Soo good. Definitely a snack or lunch or just light meal but still so tasty. We got a cookie on the house. A vegan tasty cookie!! Their menu is different on their website, on google and what they have in their store. Attached what they have in store. Be back soon.
Hands down to the best ever Vegan Burger I have ever tried, MUST try the Nuggets and butter Chickun Poutine       Amazing Dessert collection

This place is great. Its whimsical and fun. But seriously though the samosa burger is killer. I was excited for a vegan burger that wasnt a boring old impossible patty and this delivered. And they gave me extra fries for free which was so kind. The yam fries are especially great. I can already feel this turning into a new late night craving for me Vegetarian options: Vegan but not your average impossible patty

As of November 2021, Simple Bites seems to have transitioned to Vegan Fried Chick UN, a vegan s ultimate dream spot. Seriously. Theres vegan fried chicken sandwiches; vegan pulled pork; vegan chicken nuggets and chicken tenders; vegan fish and chips; a massive to-go ready dessert selection with cakes and cookies; and vegan snacks, including vegan ice cream and popcorn. There s a ton of vegan options in Vancouver, but this is the only place that seems to have it all under one roof. AND they re open late. Just go and see for yourself. The spicy chick un sandwich, masala fries, and vegan chicken nuggets are an easy and delicious go to. I ordered pick up via mobile order, where they had a special on for 3 free desserts on orders over $20. It was the happiest vegan feast.

It s very convenient semi self serve restaurant for a quick bite. Server is friendly and will show you how to order food on an iPad and bring food to your table. Ordered 3 eggs + sausage + small soup, $7 only! Definitely a great spot for students as it s right next a school.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Ms. Erina! Really appreciate your 5-stars review. . :)

reviews.review_text: Great little lunch place with good prices and lots of variety. I like the vegetarian poke bowl and the veg Japanese curry. I bring my own containers to be Earth-friendly :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Ms. Wendy. It is pleasure to serve you :)

reviews.review_text: The inside-out Mexican grilled cheese sandwich was bomb! Great mix of crunchy jalapeno chips and a sweet-savoury pepita mole. Definitely coming back to try more :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: Honestly it s impressive. >> Food 10/10, quality 10/10, prices 10/10. I ordered: - Their chipotle sauce Cali roll, it was fresh and delicious. A little bit difficult to grab with chopsticks but taste was amazing - Dalgona Coffee.... ok I ve been looking at this on the internet for awhile and wanted to try it and never really had time to make it at home. I bought from them (photo in the post) I asked for a large Dalgona Coffee with soy milk and  Dalgona rocks (caramel rocks)....holy guacamole it was delicious sweet but not extremely sweet and refreshing and creamy, for $5 I think it was definitely worth it. - Their Mole Pulled Pork Sandwhich... was delicious I mean a little sweet; a little spicy with lots of avocado inside....... This is truly a gem like Duffin Donuts, they sell everything you can think of, sushi, Mexican, fried chicken, coffees, etc. For a very reasonable price I ll be definitely trying other items in their menus  thinking to buy one of their burgers next time and I ll be re-ordering their Dalgona coffee again of course! Thank you I really hope you can stay on business regardless of everything that s going on right now. >> Order local and support local businesses like this one!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review and detail comment on specific items. Really appreciate it. :)

reviews.review_text: We had a great experience at vegan fried chickun. I brought non-vegan friends there, and they loved the nuggets, and said they wouldnt be able to tell that theyre vegan. We also went really late, and were super happy that they were open and serving food so late at night! Vegetarian options: amazing vegan food

Edit to update: Just tried the new Vegan ChickUn Nuggets and Tiramisu last night when we had some vegan friends over for dinner. The nuggets were top notch. I actually  like them better than McDs. They were very nicely crispy with excellent fluffy texture. 10/10 will order the largest size next time. Tiramisu was nice and light. The poutine got a bit soggy between packing and unboxing here at home, but made for decent morning after hash with my eggs. Old review for Simple Bites: My husband orders from here often not just because we live in the neighborhood, but because the food and service is great. The kitchen clearly takes a lot of care in their food preparation, and in developing delicious menu items. Highly recommend the portabello mushroom, calimare,  and the latest sushi burrito special option was delicious (smoked salmon and mango was combination that was new to me, and that I found delicious
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: Absolutely delicious place to eat. It being completely vegan was just a bonus. Will definitely come back to try all the other items on the menu, especially the desserts!
Amazing little simple restaurant. Good for picking up some fast and cheap but well made Japanese food. My personal favourite is the poke bowl!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: The food was delicious. I had chicken burger, nuggets and tenders few minutes ago. Was shocked for a moment as the vegan chicken tastes almost like chicken. Great taste, great quality, great menu, great price. The two boys were very friendly and smiling.

We tried the yam fries, buffalo jalapeno chikun burger and the fush o filet that they made into a lettuce wrap/bowl. Very yummy!! The servers are always kind and the desserts are delicious, I recommend the vegan cheesecake and they carry bonus bakery stuffed cookies which are amazing! I m excited for when this location gets the gf buns. We will be back for sure!
Small place with lots of vegan options, other options available as well but mainly vegan. I cant believe the amount of vegan desserts. Love it. My favorite burgers.

A really interesting place! The menu is vegan friendly as their stores name suggest, however, you need to double check with them for some of the shake and desserts are keto but not entirely vegan (include dairy). Ordered nuggets with a sweet chilli pepper burger and theyre both phenomenal. Gotta say the sauce is very delicious. The service is nice and the staff is friendly. 10/10!

Finally South Van gets some quality vegan food! I cant speak highly enough of this place. Burgers are unreal (try the coleslaw chicken one) and fries just might be my favourites in town. Also has a wide selection of  vegan desserts! On top of that the owner is super down to earth and cool! The courtesy in which he treats his customer is the main reason I keep going back. This is example of a business that is doing things just right!!

Found this place by surprise. Owner was very friendly and helpful and they seemed very busy with take out orders. Tried out their Veggies inside out grilled cheese and totally fell in love. Very unique and yummy way of making grilled cheese sandwiches. They have very interesting fusion Japanese menu items and the price point is definitely affordable. Their veggies seem very fresh. Excited to try out other menu items. This will definitely be my go to place now. And have recemmended to others. Support locals.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: Discovered through a Reddit post a few weeks ago! Haven t been to the restaurant but we ve ordered a couple times (and will continue to do so, including tonight  ). What a great little place! Yummy variety of food ranging from Japanese dishes and snacks to burgers, milk tea, skewers, salads, and more. Menu seems to change with different daily specials so it s fun to see some variety in what they serve. We ve tried many different dishes and everything tastes very fresh with basic but quality ingredients and prepared with care. The prices are also unbeatable for the quality! Also the delivery is in-house (by scooter!) so no need to depend on courier services like Uber Eats or Skip. The delivery driver is very nice and courteous too. Overall a great little place to order some yummy comfort food. Happy we discovered Simple Bites.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: Quite surprised with the authenticity of the taste!! Love it!! A good catch for the price! And they are Eco-friendly!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: Food was delicious! We had the classic crispy. Sooo fresh!
Good food and good ambience    delicious dessert !!! Great service

This place is so good. So delicious. I thought at first it was a bit expensive, but tbh its worth it to support a vegan restaurant once and the portions are huge. Lots of tasty desserts too. Staff has been friendly. And I love that its open late. Definitely reccomended!
Their burgers and the jalapeno poppers are soo yummy.  They also have a huge selection of desserts with a bunch from local vegan bakeries. Highly recommend them

High quality food with the value swaying to the quality side over the quantity side.  I found the shrimp fry and the Pork Schnitzel especially good - taste and quality of what you would find a nice sit down Japanese restaurant.  Portions might be on the smaller side depending on what youre expecting, but again, its quality over quantity.  Ordering online in advance is recommended and makes things easier.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: Good, wholesome, fresh food. Feels like home cooking in the best way. Something your mom or grandma would make. Also the prices are very fair in my opinion. Only been here twice (just because Im rarely in the neighborhood) but it I was closer by, I would definitely eat hear on a weekly basis. The man who took my order was very nice and polite as well. Service with a smile. Definitely check this place out
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: I always take a chance on a new place in the neighborhood as I feel its important to support your neighbors.  This place is clean and the dining options (somewhat limited) appear on the healthy side which is great.  I had a tofu salad and a tempura roll which were definitely restaurant quality despite the look of the place which is a simple, cafeteria style setting.  The staff were super pleasant and really nice people.  Really appreciate the high quality healthy options and I hope they do well here.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you neighbor, we are working hard to increase our menu items. Everyone from Simple Bites Inc. thank you for your comment.

reviews.review_text: This place is amazing having all vegan food with affordable prices providing: Quick and great service DELICIOUS food! Sanitize everything, very clean place I recommend this place to everyone. It s so worth it! for all vegan people  , they definitely love it once they try in Vegan fried Chick UN :)
Staff were super lovely and the food was delicious! Will definitely be going back next time we are in Vancouver.

Happy I came. Great prices great food, and theyre open till 12am~ The croquettes are nice and crispy on the outside, velvety on the inside, and not oily at all. Good quality meat. Definitely my new late night go to. Japanese comfort food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: Exceptionally tasty burger and fries!  Loved it!

First time visiting and was worth my time! I tried the fish sandwich and chocolate cake. Food was delicious and the staff are really friendly and accommodating.  I highly recommend this place! Definitely plan to go here again.

Nice place for cheap eats; interior decoration could use some work, but they offer a variety (albeit limited) of delicious meals starting as low as $3 (California roll). EDIT: Prices has raised since then, but the store overall improved a lot, especially with their menus; they offer huge food varieties ranging from Chinese to Western, and theyre all delicious. Highly recommended to drop by for a simple bite.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Mr. Lu. Everyone at Simple Bites Inc. appreciate your comment.

reviews.review_text: So affordable! Im in love with their flavoured french fries. Even though its vegan, both my carnivore roommates enjoy the chicken burgers too!

The owner is so nice. The restaurant doesnt look fancy or anything. It looks like its a bakery inside, but its hard to tell. There are a lot of interesting food items here. A little Japanese with a touch of Hawaiian. I cant wait to try more items from from here now that Im moving back into this hood.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: Everythings good! Solid affordable fast food style. AND its not all soy! Lots of great vegan dessert options. The strawb cheesecake crepes are my favorite. Delectable

They have great variety of food, snacks and drinks options for vegan and ppl on diet. I first learnt about them on UberEats, then finally visited them because Garys jar cake are now selling there too. If you love Durian dont miss the durian cake but other food and desserts looks so good too. I am gonna be here more
Some of the best Vegan Chicken I have had in quite some time. Also, I simply love their home-made sauces. They are spicy and flavorful!

This place is a great place to get quick and healthy options, and theyre open late enough to pick up food on the way home from work as well. They have everything from soup and bagels to sushi & Japanese curry. The staff are very friendly, and the one upside to it being somewhat unknown so far is that there is little-to-no wait for service. This place really deserves to be more popular than it currently is, and I really hope theyll be able to stick around.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mr. Heinrich, thank you very much for your review. Everyone at Simple Bites Inc. will keep on working hard to maintain the quality of our services.

reviews.review_text: Loveliest mom and pop shop. We had a variety of items - chicken skewers, ocean s 7 poke bowl, ocean sushi burrito, chicken karaage burrito, and michoacan pulled pork burger. All were very delicious and filling! The chicken skewer is their new item and is very juicy. The genmaicha frappe had really good tea flavour and was not too sweet. Would definitely recommend this place!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: In a city this unaffordable, we need a simple bites in every skytrain station! Really tasty food with a big variety, plenty vegetarian options, way better for you than going to some fast food chain. The owners are amazing and are doing everything they can during COVID to make it through! Support a local restaurant, get some healthy food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: burgs are amazin
Just tried this place for the first time,  got the BBQ chicken sandwich. Delicious! Fries seasoned with lemon pepper! Wow! I will definitely be back! Added bonus, the soy is GMO free

Good for at great prices. They have lots of different dishes on the menu so chances are that there is going to be something on the menu for everyone. The menu is very inexpensive with only a few set meals costing more than 10 dollars. The food is great, the portions are very reasonable for a meal and will fill you up happily.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: Wow. Such great vegan nuggets!!! Not easy to find vegan chicken this good. Super helpful and friendly staff. Excited to go back for some of the great looking desert. Vegetarian options: Vegan! Dietary restrictions: Vegan and Keto awareness

Got the Michoacan pulled pork burger and calimari. The burger was so good especially for the price of $6. The pork was juicy and the sauce was perfect. The calamari was hard to judge since it got a little bit cold by the time I brought it home from take out. There was still a lot of flavour and the squid was cooked to the right level.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: I had the brkfst sandwich on the english muffin - and it tasted better than some fast food joint! Im so glad I discovered this little gem of a place; the people are very friendly there, seating area is incredibly clean, and most importantly food is delicious! Highly recommend for a simple bite!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: The drinks are amazing!! And I got the poke and I enjoyed it so much!! I come here every couple of days and love it so much! The food here is amazing. The mini sized can fill me up. Love it!!!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: You can get a vegan buffalo chicken sandwich and a cheesecake at 1:45am (Heads up sadly not *everything* is vegan) Food

I usually go here for a coffee fix before a class, and this place makes healthy tasty food as well. Iced coffee is about $1 for a small size and Cappuccino Choco slush (or frappuccino) is about $3.50 theyre all tasty. They both serve food in mini and regular sizes. I had their Poke Bowl($10) it was big and filling. My friend D had Chicken Teriyaki Bowl it was tasty. A classmate brought tempura bowl to try and the Prawn Tempura was really good. He told me they use air fryer to make Tempura, and thats why it was tasty. Service was fast and friendly. It might be hard to find seats here sometimes so I recommend getting take-out. The name Simple Bites is very suitable for this place and their food is made with love.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: Amazing food at really good price. The two Chefs: Tin & Satto are the sweetest people, would actually prepare food according to your taste preferences. I love going to this place :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: So delicious, extremely friendly staff. So many vegan desserts! We ordered chickun sandwiches and fries. I would like to go back and try the vegan crepes.

Honest simple buzz worthy food. They basically serve all the food that young people hear on social media, such as matcha everything sushi tacos rice bowls. Basically if you are asian you will want to take a photo of the food served here. I wouldnt say the food was mind blowing but the service price and ingenuity of the food was above par.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: The burger was simply buns, lettuce, patty and mayo. But the chicken patty is likely the best vegan chicken patty Ive ever had.
We had a great experience with very friendly and quick service, yummy food, and reasonable pricing. They make really delicious nuggets!
Best takeout only vegan  fake  meat spot in the city. Not a vegan or a vegetarian, but I d eat their chickun sandwiches and nuggets any day. Tons of desert options too!
I eat their Keto Matcha Latte frozen and it is basically an ice cream.  No need to go buy a gelato AND no sugar.  Cant go wrong.

Really cool and welcoming folks who work here. The food is good quality for the price. They have budget meals that are really easy on the wallet and healthy , one thing that most health conscious food stores/restaurants have trouble with.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mr. Bagaipo, really appreciate your review. :)

reviews.review_text: Got some AMAZING vegan cruelty-free desserts...made without the cruelty of eggs and/or horrific dairy ingredients.  Too bad this place also sells non-vegan desserts though...such a shame. Sad.
Great service and great selection of asiam comfort food with affordable prices. They are always coming up with new items on the menu and it never disappoints!! Definitely recommend!

My girlfriend and I came in last night by the recommendation of Reddit; we got the Ocean and 4 Tails, and let me tell you. The Ocean burrito is one of the most delicious things I put in my mouth. My only disappointment was that I didn t order two. This place is an absolute gem in a neighborhood I grew up in, and I m 100% a repeat customer for life!! The yuzu-ade is amazing well!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. !
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: This place is freaking awesome, workers are great. Love their vegan menu. One of the best vegan results in Vancouver.

Food is really good and at an affordable price. Ive tried a wide variety of items on their menu and Im always surprised at how much I enjoy the food and the generous portion sizes. Simple and executed well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: This place is really awesome!!  The foods are really good with really affordable price!  The  workers here are really nice! They will serve you and greet you with smile! The costumer service is outstanding!  I really recommend this place if yourylooking for a place to buy food and eat quickly
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: Amazing service and amazing food! Been vegan for over a year and these were the best chick un strips I ve had so far!
The chicken is surprisingly fantastic as are their baked goods, not much of a dine-in place yet but some of the best and most delicious takeout veg food in the city
Beat vegan food in Vancouver with great service!
Love their food and the owners that work here. Affordable, home-cooked meals that taste great. Highly recommend their sushi burritos and churro donuts.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: Love this place! I m near the area often and this is my go to place for great food for a great price. The food is always great quality and they always have a healthy option, they re also very friendly and nice here!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: So amazing. Brought my Vegan Dad here and HE LOVED IT! So did I, and Im a carnivore. I wish I lived closer to this place; a must try.
Vegan chicken burgers, this place is way better that the plant-based lie from kfc. Friendly staff and fast service. Large selection on vegan and keto items.

Very modern and convenient spot! You order and can pay on touchscreen kiosks, which is handy for browsing the large menu. The owners are very helpful and friendly. Also, the prices are very affordable, and the food is delicious!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: Simple and value centric establishment. Offers Japanese metro like Bento dishes. Food is excellent for the price. Would recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: good food, great desserts, but even better and amazing owner who is very kind and generous as he will give some free stuff if waiting too long.
Simply great. Quality, quantity, service. Not a sushi roll expert, but whenever i buy sushi roll from take outs, quality feels bad. This is next level.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the 5-stars review. :)

reviews.review_text: Very nice place . Friendly staff.  suitable prices . I had California roll- old time + Smoked Chipotle Mayo  So good I liked the Smoked Chipotle Mayo the most.  Thank you Simple Bites
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Mr. Husso for the 5-star review. :)

reviews.review_text: Mm mm mm, the food is certainly delicious, and very very reasonably price. This restaurant has been developed with speed in mind as service is also relatively quick. Try this place out, you can t go wrong here
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much The Bennett. Pleasure to serve you.
